txt.en: Master Farmer Iago Glennudh, impressed with the tasks you completed for him and Violed Isbrun, desires your help once again.

'Stay and speak with me a bit, [placeholder]. You've a good eye for farming, and I was wondering if ye would help me again.\n\n'Could ye gather up more boar-droppings and marigolds for me and Violed? We're always in need of these, and ye know what to look for...will ye help us?'
Boar-droppings and marigolds can be found throughout the Gloomglens.\n\nIago Glennudh has asked you to go out and find more boar-droppings and marigolds.
'Oh thank you, [placeholder]...these will help us immensely for the next season! It is fortunate we met you!'
Iago Glennudh is at Maur Tulhau in the Gloomglens of Enedwaith.\n\nYou should bring the droppings and flowers you collected back to Iago Glennudh.
'Ho! There's much to be done and much that is needed...like fertilizer and flowers!'
Talk to Iago Glennudh at Maur Tulhau
